sentence.text: While polyglutamine ataxias, linked to CAG repeat expansions in genes such as ATXN1, negative regulation of receptor internalization, protein K63-linked deubiquitination, histone deubiquitination, positive regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration and TBP, have been extensively characterized in large cohorts, there is a need for comprehensive assessment of frequency and phenotype of more 'conventional' ataxias.

entity.text: positive regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration

sentence.text: In conclusion, we identified relevant genetic variations in up to 15% of cases after exclusion of polyglutamine expansion spinocerebellar ataxias, and confirmed CACNA1A and regulation of mitochondrial membrane permeability as major ataxia genes.
